description.value:
Massive Sets of Databanks used for processing large datasets. Most are capable of automatically writing and printing information to data-scrolls, large screens, or holo-projectors to display their data. They provide +20 to relvent tests of their usage. Typically Literacy, Logic, and Lore Tests.

Requirements

Doesn't need to be on the character's person, Merely needs to be able to be accessed readily (such as it being housed on the Character's vessel).

Effect: Average

Notes: 4000+T
